title: By the King, a proclamation of His Majesties grace, favour, and pardon to the inhabitants of his counties of Stafford and Derby
author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
notes: "Given at our Court at Oxford this five and twentieth day of March in the eighteenth yeare of our reigne."
Reproduction of original in the Societies of Antiquaries Library, London.
